snippet.title: THE Zombie Crisis - THE ゾンビクライシス (Simple DS Series Vol 32) NDS
snippet.description:
Running on Desmume

I nice shooter for the big N's handheld, solid gameplay but hard as all games in this genre

"the simple" series are cheap games from a number of relatively small dev teams, normally about 
2000yen, those games have all sort of stiles (shooters, simulators and of course a ton of novels, majog and text adventures) 

counsidering the prices some of them are quite impressive, even with ocidental ports


this wikipedia page list them
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Simple_series_video_games


#railshooter #zombies #nintendods
